paper_abstract: Image-based approaches based on one-class classifiers are presented. The information is extracted with a feature-based representation and recognized by using an ensemble of one-class classifiers. The features extracted by "FingerCode" are used to capture the ridge strength. The experiments show that our system outperforms the standard "FingerCode" recognition method. (c) 2006 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Random Bands: A novel ensemble for fingerprint matching
